name: data-convert
description: Convert between structured data formats (JSON, YAML, TOML, XML, CSV)
author: uniconv

dependencies.name: python3
dependencies.install_hint: brew install python3 (macOS) or apt install python3 (Linux)

dependencies.name: pyyaml
dependencies.description: Required for YAML parsing and serialization

dependencies.name: toml
dependencies.description: Required for TOML parsing and serialization
